subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The Champ Car World Series added Spain to its schedule for 2008, putting 8 of its 14 races outside the United States. The June 8 race will be held on the 2.752-mile Circuito de Jerez, a permanent course in southern Spain also used in testing by Formula One. Champ Car will run three races in Europe, the others in Zolder, Belgium, on June 1 and Assen, the Netherlands, on Sept. 14. The schedule also includes three races in Canada, one in Mexico and one in Australia.
